attributes.action: urge the british public that not all teeangers are 'yobs'
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: For years now the young generation have been constantly discriminated against simply because of their age. We hope that the Prime Minister will urge, with the help of the leader of this petition to generate more positive media on the young generation, instead of constant bad publicity. We hope to create a better understanding between all parts of the society, creating a more understanding and better place to live.
